title: How to go on The Ellen DeGeneres Show on TV - Quora
tags: The Ellen DeGeneres Show (TV talk show)

response.answer_text: Well, you’ll need to get yourself to Burbank, California from where ever in the world you’re writing from. You can request tickets to the show on their website. Request Tickets - Available Dates If you are a minor, you’ll need an adult to accompany you. Here are some other FAQ. Ticket Holder Frequently Asked Questions

I have never seen a site where there are more people asking really stupid questions. 1-U have to know that her show is in California. With the question ur asking it’s obvious u can’t put 2 + 2 together & try to figure this out for yourself. 2-depending on what state u live in u can either drive to her show or take public transportation. This is why computers were invented u can find out where things are. The Ellen Show 3000 West Alameda Avenue Burbank, California. from this pint on your on your own
